definition: category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: Your reality is only spirit. Therefore you are in a state of grace forever.
sentences.chinese: 你的實相是純粹屬靈的，因此你永存於恩典之境。

sentences.english: Confessing my sin is good for my health.
sentences.chinese: 向神認罪是對屬靈健康有益的。
驕傲，激情，和屬靈的軟弱。

sentences.english: Only believers have the spiritual gift of being blessed.
sentences.chinese: 只有信徒纔有這種被祝福的屬靈禮物。

sentences.english: So that's why love and faith must be emotional, spiritual twins.
sentences.chinese: 因此，愛和信心是情感與屬靈的孿生兒。

sentences.english: He wants you to grow up spiritually and become like Christ.
sentences.chinese: 他想要你在屬靈的生命上成長，活出主耶穌的樣式。

sentences.english: Led to a deepening of a grasp of spiritual truth.
sentences.chinese: 這帶來對屬靈真理更深入的掌握。

sentences.english: God uses the opposite situation of each fruit to allow us a choice.
sentences.chinese: 神以屬靈果子反面的景況來讓我們作出選擇。

sentences.english: Paul exposed a kind of service that appears to be spiritual but is really just a put-on, a show, an act to get attention.
sentences.chinese: 保羅揭露了一種看似屬靈，但實質是僞裝的事奉。

sentences.english: Answering the Call of Your Theophany - Jn A.
sentences.chinese: 迴應你屬靈身體的呼喚。

sentences.english: He had a deep spiritual hunger.
sentences.chinese: 可是，在他心中卻有極深的屬靈渴求。

sentences.english: Superficial happiness without spiritual holiness in one of hell's major exports.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏屬靈聖潔的膚淺快樂是地獄最大宗的輸出品。

sentences.english: The mark of spiritual maturity is growing awareness of the sinfulness of sin.
sentences.chinese: 屬靈的成熟，就是漸漸知道罪惡的本質。

sentences.english: But he that is spiritual judgeth all things, yet he himself is judged of no man.
sentences.chinese: 屬靈的人能看透萬事，卻沒有一人能看透了他。

sentences.english: The ultimate goal of spiritual giftedness and fruitfulness is to point men and women to God.
sentences.chinese: 屬靈恩賜和果子的終極目標是使人歸向上帝。

sentences.english: With the apostles, the spiritual geneology of Jesus Christ began to unfold.
sentences.chinese: 自使徒開紿，一個屬靈的耶穌基督的家譜在延續。

definition: to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
